metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25683 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
It was discovered that the get_starttime() function in data/apport did not properly parse the /proc/pid/stat file from the kernel.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25683` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-gtk - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-kde - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-noui - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-retrace - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-valgrind - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
dh-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
python3-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
python3-problem-report - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16').
